hello world.What does 'Hello, World!' mean?: A simple program often used to illustrate the basics of a programming language.
hello world.Why is 'Hello, World!' famous?: It is typically the first program written by beginners to understand syntax.

http.404: Not Found - The requested resource could not be found.
http.500: Internal Server Error - The server encountered an unexpected condition.
http.301: Moved Permanently - The resource has been moved to a different URL.
http.403: Forbidden - The client does not have permission to access this resource.
